titles.title: Informatics Act of 2005
To amend title 35, United States Code, to promote research among universities, the public sector, and private enterprise in the informatics realm.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary: 11/2/2005--Introduced. Informatics Act of 2005 - Expands the definition of "product" for purposes of patent infringment provisions to include both physical goods and information in any fixed format.
